      • encodePassword

        public static String encodePassword(String password,
                                    String algorithm)
        Encode event string using algorithm specified in web.xml and return the resulting encrypted password. If exception, the plain credentials string is returned
        参数:
        password - Password or other credentials to use in authenticating this username
        algorithm - Algorithm used to do the digest
        返回:
        encypted password based on the algorithm.

      • encodeString

        public static String encodeString(String str)
        Encode event string using Base64 encoding. Used when storing passwords as cookies. This is weak encoding in that anyone can use the decodeString routine to reverse the encoding.
        参数:
        str -
        返回:
        String

      • decodeString

        public static String decodeString(String str)
        Decode event string using Base64 encoding.
        参数:
        str -
        返回:
        String
